mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_EGU_PRICING (CASE_CODE, EVA_CODE, ARISE_TIME, RESPONSE_TIME, STATUS, RESULT, UNIT_PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE, IS_FINAL, APPLY_CODE, COMFIRM_SEQ,FIN_ORG_CODE,IS_MAIN_LOAN_BANK,EXPECT_RATE,ARISER_ID ) values (#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ariseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{responseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isFinal,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comfirmSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isMainLoanBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{expectRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ariserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

CASE_CODE,

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_EGU_PRICING WHERE EVA_CODE = #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by pkid desc
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_EGU_PRICING
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVA_CODE = #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARISE_TIME = #{ariseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RESPONSE_TIME = #{responseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_FINAL = #{isFinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_CODE = #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMFIRM_SEQ = #{comfirmSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIN_ORG_CODE = #{finOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_MAIN_LOAN_BANK = #{isMainLoanBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPECT_RATE = #{expectRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARISER_ID = #{ariserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from sctrans.T_TO_EGU_PRICING where case_code = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IS_FINAL = '1'
